original_text: And their border on the north side was from Jordan; and the border went up to the side of Jericho on the north side, and went up through the mountains westward; and the goings out thereof were at the wilderness of Bethaven.
korean_text: 그들의 북방 경계는 요단에서부터 여리고 북쪽으로 올라가서 서쪽 산지를 넘어서 또 올라가서 벧아웬 황무지에 이르며

sentences.original_text: And their border on the north side was from Jordan
and the border went up to the side of Jericho on the north side
and went up through the mountains westward
and the goings out thereof were at the wilderness of Bethaven
sentences.korean_translation: 그 경계의 끝은 벧아ven 광야에 있었습니다
